description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Your Avatar is stuck in a burning tower! Flee from the fire by jumping the platforms. Make combos and collect stars to gain higher scores. Try to break your own highscore!
description.short: Your Avatar is stuck in a burning tower! Flee from the fire by jumping the platforms. Make combos and collect stars to gain higher scores. Try to break your own highscore!
